Posts.Content: Hi had 2nd year mammogram yesterday, they showed me pics from last year and this year and they both show i had 6 surgical clips left in lest breast from where they had removed tumour, they didnt seem concerned, just want to make sure this is ok...
Posts.Title: Surgical clips left in breast

Posts.Content: hi i noticed you wrote abouyt immune busitng stuff, i take echinacea everyday - its Â£1.90 for the extract in saisnbuyrys, i also take an immune boosting multi vit with probiotic. i am in 1st chemo, just feel dizzy all the time like being on a boat - hair is starting to come out in bits, but i had all my long hair cut off weeks ago and a friend is coming on thursday to No.4 it all over, and to bring loads of bandanas. its all okish at the mo, i jsut think well only 5 more to go - if its just 5 days of feeling yuk i can handle that, mind you havent been too good doing my exercises so arm is a bit stiff by the way i have TNBC, had left breas lumpectomy and node removal which were clear
Posts.Title: had first chemo Fec what else to come!!!
